editform.fieldChangeWarning: Changing the type, subtype, or format may cause inconsistencies.
editform.fieldDeleteTooltip: This field will no longer be visible on the {kindName}s that already contain it unless the key is reused. However, the information will remain in the database.
editform.optionKeyWarning: Modifying the key or deleting the option may cause inconsistencies in {kindName}s using this option.
editform.optionHiddenTooltip: If enabled, this field will not be displayed in the results when this option is selected
editform.optionDeleteTooltip: This option will no longer be visible on the {kindName}s that already contain it unless the key is reused. However, the information will remain in the database.
editform.eventKeyWarning: Modifying the key or deleting the event may cause inconsistencies in {kindName}s using this event.
editform.eventDeleteTooltip: This event will no longer be visible on the {kindName}s that already contain it unless the key is reused. However, the information will remain in the database.
editform.keyWarning: If modified, {kindName}s in the database containing the old key will no longer be able to display this field unless a compatible field in the form takes over the old key.
editform.keyAlreadyInUse: Key already in use by another field

editformjson.description: Direct editing of the form in .json, useful for import/export. Make other changes this way only if you precisely understand the form structure. To save, use the preview button, which will allow you to first check your changes in the visual editor. Any unsaved changes made in the visual editor will be overwritten.
editformjson.importSuccess: File imported successfully. Changes are not yet saved.
editformjson.syncSuccess: Synchronization successful. Please verify your changes and save.
editformjson.syncError: Synchronization error. Is your JSON syntactically correct?
editformjson.invalidJson: The imported file does not have a valid JSON structure.
